objects.text: Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor • Electronic viewfinder • Multiple manual controls • Compact design • Wi-Fi connectivity
EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT - LIMITED TIME OFFER

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro design with premium black finish and ergonomic grip
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system with XF mount
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting adjustments
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Compact and lightweight mirrorless design ideal for travel
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-series lenses
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp, precise shots
• Ideal for both beginners and experienced photographers
• Durable metal construction for long-lasting performance
• High-performance lens with bright maximum aperture
• Multiple creative shooting modes and film simulation options
• Perfect balance of professional features and user-friendly operation

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a central hero product image framed by a modern, futuristic design. A dark radial gradient background enriched with geometric circles and minimal white lines gives the composition depth and sophistication. At the top, the bold and prominent text layer labeled "heading" announces the product name. Directly below, the "subheading" text layer delivers a sleek, blue tagline accentuating the accessibility of professional photography. The "description" text layer lists product features in subtle white font, contributing detailed value. The "tagline" text offers urgency as a limited-time deal alert. The “price” text is large and vibrant in blue, emphasizing affordability. A rounded blue rectangular shape labeled “cta_button” integrates with the black “cta” text for the call-to-action, enticing users to engage immediately. Overall, the banner balances clean typographic hierarchy with a professional tech aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #121212 (Charcoal Black)
- Typography (Primary): #FFFFFF (Pure White)
- Highlight Text & CTA Elements: #55AAFF (Sky Blue)
- Price Tag: #55AAFF
- Button Text: #000000 (Black)
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, predominantly in sleek matte black (#1C1C1C), giving it a professional and premium aesthetic. The textured grip and lens barrel enhance its depth using darker greys (#2F2F2F). The metallic highlights on the control dials and lens edges appear in silver with a subtle chrome effect (#B0B0B0), while the engraved markings feature crisp white (#FFFFFF) and vivid orange-red (#FF4500) for accents, capturing attention. The lens glass reflects subtle greenish-yellow hues (#B6C553), adding dimension. For an advertisement banner, a monochrome palette with strategic use of white, silver, and orange highlights ensures sophistication and brand consistency.
